statements: DELETE FROM callbacks WHERE agent_id = 5 AND callback_time < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM callbacks WHERE callback_id IN (SELECT callback_id FROM agents WHERE agent_name = 'John Smith') AND priority = 1;
DELETE FROM CallbackRequests WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND priority = 'High';
DELETE FROM CallbackRequests WHERE priority = 'High' AND requested_at < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM AgentAvailability WHERE agent_id = 3 AND available = TRUE;
